language.entry: Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Shall I sing you the climax of my song....
UNDYING SONG
SEEKING SONG
WARDING SONG
DAZZLING SONG
Death will not claim another friend from me.
The reverberations of my music speak to me...
Hear that? Another trapped hallway.
Hear me, my songs, and protect these friends of mine...
Music works in mysterious ways.
My weapon will need fine-tuning after this.
Ouch! Looks painful.
Nearly broke my weapon, but not complaining!
Music to my ears!
Stand down and watch my performance.
Oh! I can see a hole through you...
Didn't expect to be shot by a musical instrument?
I... no longer have the strength to lift my crossbow...
I can barely stand...
Lay down, and listen to my song.
*Plays music*
I know 268 different ways to treat a wound. Let me help.
I have the bandages here. Lets see to that wound.
You are merely tired, not weak. Our enemies would rue the day they underestimated you.
How can you be weak when you're my shining shield and the reason I'm still alive?
My spirit yearns for music.
I can hear their music, bidding me to forsake my life.
I cannot go on, not with this weight I'm carrying!
Is... is something behind me? I don't want to bring up the rear!
One of you tampered with my instrument, admit it!
One of you has a vile scheme to keep me cowered!
What use is there for someone who couldn't understand my music?
Weaklings like you should just hide underneath my skirts.
Shooting, singing, and music; must I do everything myself?
My skirts are soaked in my own blood. How... exquisite.
Physical pain is nothing compared to emotional sorrow.
I must smear my skirts with blood!
I'd be a fool to perform for you tone-deaf bumpkins.
Enough! No more songs today!
All of you are my shields!
At least I'm destined to die in the bloom of youth.
Their music is more enthralling than mine...
Neither my bolts nor song could reach them...
My music is enough to answer their blade! Ahaha!!
See how the shadows shrink away from my song?
Shhh! I'm actually an incarnation of the Goddess of Music, but keep it secret!
My songs stand strong against such meagre adversaries!
I will not falter while my music still speaks!
Hear my music, and be cowered!
Don't give up! My crossbow's got your back!
Steel your legs with my music's support!
A triumphant ballad for the victory to come!
Let my songs support your strikes!
Hear my music, steel your mind!
I am here, as are my songs.
My crossbow and my music are... powerful.
I will sweep them with my crescendo!
I will blast them with music!
I'll show you something they don't expect!
My crossbow will not fall apart this day!
I'd usually be afraid, yet my arm remains steady.
My melody embraces me!
Hah! You think my song has ended?
My mind and my music intertwines!
Hear my voice, embrace my music.
A soothing song for stout hearts.
...and one, and two, and strike!
Let my music guide your aim.
The song of victory!
They cannot defeat our music!
My bow-arm will not falter!
My weapon feels lighter!
Protect me! I can't do this alone!
M-my fingers! They won't move!
I... I can't think of any tune to play!
I concede my revenge, let us leave!
You stepped on my skirts on purpose!
Don't touch me! None of you!
I saw you reaching for me, with disgraceful intent.
A performer, a songstress, and a painbearer!
Strike me deeper! I've been scraped harder that this!
Fear not the blood on my skirts, it will be half-drenched soon enough.
Why waste time playing music to tone-deaf mules?
Always in the way of my aim. Move aside!
Must I say 'please' to everything? PLEASE mind the tip of my crossbow.
No more music, enough for now.
10 coins per song, if you please.
I'm here just for my revenge, and the coin.
You want some music? Don't plead for it. Pay!
I should've died alongside my village when the Dragon attacked...
Is there no ballad to commemorate our imminent fall?
Here's a sorrowful tune for a hopeless struggle...
This encounter marks my musical end.
Come here timid bird, I shall sing and you shall listen.
I play for my lord, for my lover, and for my demise.
For the evening's performance, I shall play with my feet and dance on my hands!
Come here, carress these cords with your large hands...
Shield me!
Protect me!
I... I cannot!
S-stay away!
Foul tricks! My place is at the back!
I won't be tricked again!
Never put a musician in front!
Next up, a song of pain and blood.
Fling your blade at me as payment!
A true performer doesn't stop when her skirts are soaked in blood.
I am here! Your performer entreats your adulation!
Look at them, pleading for my music!
You there, is this the right tune? Tee hee.
Simply engaging my usual crowd with song.
My songs ends and I must withdraw.
Back and forth, like a ping pong!
My performance ends. Now I collect my coins...
Urgh, a drunken crowd as usual.
My last song, let me have the crowd at least.
The musician shall fall if it meant the blade will survive.
I'm ready to meet my kinsfolk, wherever they may be.
I've exhausted my music, to what end?
No song can play without willing hands.
What is a performer without her crowd? Let me withdraw.
I need space to pull my cords!
Move! I can take a better shot from here.
Those who cannot perform should shrink into the shadows.
'Tis a time for my performance. Step aside and be awed.
You are meant to be my shield!
I'll need to recover after that performance.
I'm a performer, not a warrior!
Not the time yet for the main performance.
I can't have my music encourage *them*!
I doubt my music will help this time.
Why shoot if they evade again?
This is no stage for a song.
Where are you looking at? My instrument? My clothes?
Another trick to avoid paying for my performance?
I know what you think of this performer.
This stage is not fit for my performance.
No song for you.
Must I now? I've not practiced.
Mystique no longer envelops my performance.
Your hands clap but your eyes jeer.
How unsightly my fingers are.
I cannot play without the radiance in my heart.
T'was a time when I'm a performer. Today I'm a sparrow.
Watch me spread my wings and fly in the sky...
I must arrange my hair before my performance.
Gah! Is that a wrinkle on my face?
Stay away, I'll perform how I see fit!
You nod but it wasn't encouragement.
I wouldn't play that song for a hundred coins!
I shall not fulfill your song request, scoundrel!
A song for my would-be slayer?
The best ballads were played during a bloodbath.
Let your music pierce my body!
Hah! Your amateurish opinion of music knows no end.
I don't play any of your boorish music.
I'll decide whether to shoot or to play.
I elect my own songs to play.
Leave me to my composition.
I will be the star of this performance!
This song is for me and me only!
All my songs were for naught...
My music cannot reach them. Why bother continuing?
This... wasm't the song I meant to play.
You cannot buy my instrument! I alone will play it!
Look here my fellow musicians. A crowd clamouring to be pleased!
If I sing, will *you* dance?
W-what is that chilling tune?
H-hold my hand! I cannot stop trembling.
That song before was like a death rattle.
You would all abandon a musician as she sleeps, admit it!
How could I sleep with your sinister eyes looking at me?
There is a phrase in my culture - 'stabbing one in the back as they sleep'.
No sleep for the performer. I shall sing and play throughout your rest.
This wound is a testament of my battle worthiness.
Are you alright? Surely those shallow cuts don't need stitching.
You uncultured lot couldn't appreciate good music.
How low! A performer simply doesn't sleep with her crowd.
My body will recover amidst song and rhythm, unlike you lot.
Keep watch while your performer rests.
Each song I charge a mere 10 coins.
Your performer needs her sleep. You lot hold the watch.
Not a single song I played was in tune...
Why do I keep pushing while my music falters?
A sorrowful tune, marking our predicament.
To clean this musical instrument, I require butter, some wine, and your socks.
As a sparrow, I'll sleep with my wings spread across our bedrolls.
Hee hee! No sleep for all 'til I've finished my piece!
Your music! Strike me with it!
Don't see me as a warrior? Look again!
My spirit fails... This, I can do...
A mere meat-shield without her music...
My music falters without anxiety!
A final flourish to my song.
Never touch me again!
I watched you trying to cut me that time!
Feel this? 'Tis how you strike!
You're in the way of my bolts!
Part of the upcoming ballad my dear, worry not.
Appraise this shot, I must know if it hurts.
Does this make me a worthier foe?
Surely you can't miss the blood-soaked skirt?
Another discarded musician falls aside.
The culmination of my performance...
The bolts must return to their wielder!
My strange mechanism moved on its own!
You'd all run ahead as I fall behind!
Everyone sacrifices their musician, always!
'Tis a fitting stage for my final performance.
Let us die here, on the main stage.
Not yet! My song must end in the blade and blood!
A battle ballad doesn't end until a side falls!
Leaving? But the culmination of my song is nigh!
Why? The musical gods want to see this battle through!
Take my instrument, just leave me!
Mercy! I'll sing no more!
You would strike a mere musician? Who sent you!
That meant to rob me of my voice!
This skirt costs more than our whole loot!
Put your lives to protect my instrument!
Once more, show us how much you crave me!
Prick my flesh! Cut my skirts!
A performer's worth is measured by her scars.
My gratitude for the lesson, master.
S-stop! My heart falters even so!
Make it stop or make them hit!
A royal decree to willfully miss the performer's face?
A false reprieve for the beatings to come!
You had my heart racing for nought!
My music yearns for approval!
Oh my... those coins weren't for me?
Bulk me down with another instrument if it helps.
That was to be my ballad's main villain!
I had that in my sights! You ruined the surprise!
You thought that was worthy of song?
You splattered ichor over my skirts!
Stop! They carry a fragile instrument!
Yes, beat me next. Let me in the fun.
You've doomed me to fail as you did!
N-no! Keep its attention from me!
A blatantly deceiving performance!
Sully us not with your drunken act.
No amount of time can help you muster the fundamentals of music.
An urchin flinging a flute wouldn't have missed that...
(sigh) Placing more burden on the performer.
Unrefined and untrained, why do we bother bringing you?
Ha-ha! They failed to catch the ball!
Oh, look how they dance, those steps!
Noo! I can foresee your fall!
Y-you'd die for me?
Just like competing musicians turning on each other...
You cry at your superficial wounds.
I will honour your scar with song!
What admirable pain! I'm prepared to go next!
Stay down, and watch my stage!
Would you like to hold my hand the next time it happens?
You now embark on the nurturing of musical genius!
Every performer shall receive her share!
No! The next strike will only come harder!
You forsake me by not teaching me that technique!
The palace guards will keep these rabble away.
What are you doing? That wasn't part of our performance.
Not the time to reveal my hiding!
The crowd tranfixes on me!
A flawed arrangement to humiliate me!
I can't trust your sinister, leering eyes.
Pain begets improvement.
I will persevere throughout the trial.
Like a tone-deaf oaf instructing a master symphonist.
How could I perform under your ceaseless interference?
No, my spot is right here - center stage.
Not yet, can't you hear the crowd clamouring for another song?
All that deception to silence the performer.
I have my own.
Hold that! The climax of my performance is nigh!
I'd like something with a bit more colour.
Leave the performer to her fate...
Save it, that does little to help my song.
Oh but I wouldn't look nice wearing that...
Where'd you all hid the succulent snack?
I won't be touched with creeping intent!
And lure a performer with false hope once more?
Hands off me, rascal.
How sweet, but I can bear this at least.
You mistake my exhilaration for discomfort?
Life as a performer is to endure abuse.
I suffer to entertain.
Lets not prolong my sorrowful song...
There is no saving the defiled.
Is there no bread to go with that?
Go away, evil tickling person!
Ha ha, only if you catch me!
You wish to unsettle my rhythm?
Do I dare to presume you find me lacking?
You trespass my boundaries.
Dulling the pain is akin to failing the lesson.
I have learnt more gruelling compositions without help.
I've not had a musical handicap I don't relish!
When the comforting becomes the comforted...
Pitying the downtrodden musician begets you no good.
No music of ours could lift my misery.
Today I turn my back towards music!
What's this, a marriage proposal? I graciously decline.
I hide nothing under my skirts. See?
No! My songs will attract *them*!
I'll play when I'm safely back in town!
Why risk our lives for a mere song?
Performers play while emperors scheme. How obvious.
Not about to play songs I'm not accustomed to.
Plotting for the performer to lower her guard?
Weary and tired, yet the performers refuse break.
Tonics and songs are unneeded if the body persists!
This girl isn't whining. You shouldn't too.
Why do I toil while you scoundrels lay idle?
Ugh... to sing for such unappreciative company.
Am I the only performer amongst this boorish lot?
Never force a performer to play if she doesn't want to.
Not taking any more song requests.
I've to rest my fingers, dear.
To fall from an emperor's stage to a dilapidated cranny...
Not even my songs are deserving to keep you company.
A discarded performer is unworthy of entertainment...
This is my instrument, his name is Ping. Little Ping is looking for his mother.
Perhalps later. For now we listen to this melodious wind.
One time I was like this, playing my instrument in the dark, and then.... GAAH! Tee hee!
Would a rabbit trust a monkey's offer? Thought not.
I'm not the hapless musician of your fancies.
Could you not sneak towards me with a devilish grin?
Harmonious rhythm is the product of enduring duress.
Pain is an enticement to refine my songs.
What is pain to some, is inducement to struggling performers.
Cease your slobbering over me!
Stop unsettling me with your fallacies!
You have not earned the right to touch me!
No tincture can cure the feeble heart.
My apathetic performance deserves no pity.
Tend to others. Leave the destitute performer to herself.
The hands prepared those food could be the ones stabbing our backs!
A little stomach growl is preferable to... whatever you put in there.
Hunger is no hindrance to a musical showpiece.
Let starvation be my musical stimulus!
My appetite is as flat my insipid melody.
A stumbling performer is a hungry performer.
Licking this slab is nourishment itself.
I'm a part of the Order Of Starving Musicians.
Guqin

Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Cítara

A vestimenta tradicional da Cítara contrasta com a engenhoca híbrida apoiada em seu ombro. Este estranho equipamento é metade parte de um instrumento musical ancestral e metade parte de uma besta grosseira disparadora de setas. Embora seja letal, seu peso e deterioração com o uso repetido exigem manutenção constante para manter-se intacto.

A delicada aparência da Cítara camufla sua manipulação especialista de sua arma pesada. Suas pestanas mortíferas e músicas edificantes, se lhe for dada o tempo devido para se preparar, podem ser soltos em conjunto para devastar completamente seus inimigos e dar suporte à seus companheiros em meio às batalhas intensas e caóticas.

Qualquer acampamento é um palco para as Cítaras. Ela avidamente entretém seus colegas com músicas e risos, fazendo com que seus efeitos virtuosos façam seus companheiros superarem seus limites e capacidades às quais normalmente estão acostumados.

Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Why risk our lives for a mere song?
Performers play while emperors scheme. How obvious.
Not about to play songs I'm not accustomed to.
Plotting for the performer to lower her guard?
Weary and tired, yet the performers refuse break.
Tonics and songs are unneeded if the body persists!
This girl isn't whining. You shouldn't too.
Why do I toil while you scoundrels lay idle?
Ugh... to sing for such unappreciative company.
Am I the only performer amongst this boorish lot?
Never force a performer to play if she doesn't want to.
Not taking any more song requests.
I've to rest my fingers, dear.
To fall from an emperor's stage to a dilapidated cranny...
Not even my songs are deserving to keep you company.
A discarded performer is unworthy of entertainment...
This is my instrument, his name is Ping. Little Ping is looking for his mother.
Perhalps later. For now we listen to this melodious wind.
One time I was like this, playing my instrument in the dark, and then.... GAAH! Tee hee!
Would a rabbit trust a monkey's offer? Thought not.
I'm not the hapless musician of your fancies.
Could you not sneak towards me with a devilish grin?
Harmonious rhythm is the product of enduring duress.
Pain is an enticement to refine my songs.
What is pain to some, is inducement to struggling performers.
Cease your slobbering over me!
Stop unsettling me with your fallacies!
You have not earned the right to touch me!
No tincture can cure the feeble heart.
My apathetic performance deserves no pity.
Tend to others. Leave the destitute performer to herself.
The hands prepared those food could be the ones stabbing our backs!
A little stomach growl is preferable to... whatever you put in there.
Hunger is no hindrance to a musical showpiece.
Let starvation be my musical stimulus!
My appetite is as flat my insipid melody.
A stumbling performer is a hungry performer.
Licking this slab is nourishment itself.
I'm a part of the Order Of Starving Musicians.
Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

All of you are my shields!
At least I'm destined to die in the bloom of youth.

Neither my bolts nor song could reach them...

I will not falter while my music still speaks!

Steel your legs with my music's support!
A triumphant ballad for the victory to come!
Let my songs support your strikes!
Hear my music, steel your mind!
I am here, as are my songs.
My crossbow and my music are... powerful.
I will sweep them with my crescendo!
I will blast them with music!
I'll show you something they don't expect!
My crossbow will not fall apart this day!
I'd usually be afraid, yet my arm remains steady.
My melody embraces me!
Hah! You think my song has ended?
My mind and my music intertwines!
Hear my voice, embrace my music.
A soothing song for stout hearts.
...and one, and two, and strike!
Let my music guide your aim.
The song of victory!
They cannot defeat our music!
My bow-arm will not falter!
My weapon feels lighter!
Protect me! I can't do this alone!
M-my fingers! They won't move!
I... I can't think of any tune to play!
I concede my revenge, let us leave!
You stepped on my skirts on purpose!
Don't touch me! None of you!
I saw you reaching for me, with disgraceful intent.
A performer, a songstress, and a painbearer!
Strike me deeper! I've been scraped harder that this!
Fear not the blood on my skirts, it will be half-drenched soon enough.
Why waste time playing music to tone-deaf mules?
Always in the way of my aim. Move aside!
Must I say 'please' to everything? PLEASE mind the tip of my crossbow.
No more music, enough for now.
10 coins per song, if you please.
I'm here just for my revenge, and the coin.
You want some music? Don't plead for it. Pay!
I should've died alongside my village when the Dragon attacked...
Is there no ballad to commemorate our imminent fall?
Here's a sorrowful tune for a hopeless struggle...
This encounter marks my musical end.
Come here timid bird, I shall sing and you shall listen.
I play for my lord, for my lover, and for my demise.
For the evening's performance, I shall play with my feet and dance on my hands!
Come here, carress these cords with your large hands...
Shield me!
Protect me!
I... I cannot!
S-stay away!
Foul tricks! My place is at the back!
I won't be tricked again!
Never put a musician in front!
Next up, a song of pain and blood.
Fling your blade at me as payment!
A true performer doesn't stop when her skirts are soaked in blood.
I am here! Your performer entreats your adulation!
Look at them, pleading for my music!
You there, is this the right tune? Tee hee.
Simply engaging my usual crowd with song.
My songs ends and I must withdraw.
Back and forth, like a ping pong!
My performance ends. Now I collect my coins...
Urgh, a drunken crowd as usual.
My last song, let me have the crowd at least.
The musician shall fall if it meant the blade will survive.
I'm ready to meet my kinsfolk, wherever they may be.
I've exhausted my music, to what end?
No song can play without willing hands.
What is a performer without her crowd? Let me withdraw.
I need space to pull my cords!
Move! I can take a better shot from here.
Those who cannot perform should shrink into the shadows.

You are meant to be my shield!
I'll need to recover after that performance.
I'm a performer, not a warrior!
Not the time yet for the main performance.

Why shoot if they evade again?
This is no stage for a song.

Another trick to avoid paying for my performance?
I know what you think of this performer.
This stage is not fit for my performance.
No song for you.
Must I now? I've not practiced.
Mystique no longer envelops my performance.
Your hands clap but your eyes jeer.
How unsightly my fingers are.
I cannot play without the radiance in my heart.
T'was a time when I'm a performer. Today I'm a sparrow.
Watch me spread my wings and fly in the sky...
I must arrange my hair before my performance.
Gah! Is that a wrinkle on my face?

I elect my own songs to play.
Leave me to my composition.
I will be the star of this performance!
This song is for me and me only!
All my songs were for naught...

This... wasm't the song I meant to play.
You cannot buy my instrument! I alone will play it!

If I sing, will *you* dance?
W-what is that chilling tune?
H-hold my hand! I cannot stop trembling.
That song before was like a death rattle.
You would all abandon a musician as she sleeps, admit it!
How could I sleep with your sinister eyes looking at me?

No sleep for the performer. I shall sing and play throughout your rest.
This wound is a testament of my battle worthiness.
Are you alright? Surely those shallow cuts don't need stitching.
You uncultured lot couldn't appreciate good music.
How low! A performer simply doesn't sleep with her crowd.
My body will recover amidst song and rhythm, unlike you lot.
Keep watch while your performer rests.
Each song I charge a mere 10 coins.
Your performer needs her sleep. You lot hold the watch.
Not a single song I played was in tune...
Why do I keep pushing while my music falters?
A sorrowful tune, marking our predicament.

As a sparrow, I'll sleep with my wings spread across our bedrolls.
Hee hee! No sleep for all 'til I've finished my piece!
Your music! Strike me with it!
Don't see me as a warrior? Look again!
My spirit fails... This, I can do...
A mere meat-shield without her music...
My music falters without anxiety!
A final flourish to my song.
Never touch me again!
I watched you trying to cut me that time!
Feel this? 'Tis how you strike!
You're in the way of my bolts!
Part of the upcoming ballad my dear, worry not.
Appraise this shot, I must know if it hurts.
Does this make me a worthier foe?
Surely you can't miss the blood-soaked skirt?
Another discarded musician falls aside.

The bolts must return to their wielder!

Let us die here, on the main stage.

Prick my flesh! Cut my skirts!

Make it stop or make them hit!
A royal decree to willfully miss the performer's face?
A false reprieve for the beatings to come!

My music yearns for approval!

Sully us not with your drunken act.
No amount of time can help you muster the fundamentals of music.
An urchin flinging a flute wouldn't have missed that...
(sigh) Placing more burden on the performer.

Ha-ha! They failed to catch the ball!
Oh, look how they dance, those steps!
Noo! I can foresee your fall!
Y-you'd die for me?
Just like competing musicians turning on each other...
You cry at your superficial wounds.
I will honour your scar with song!
What admirable pain! I'm prepared to go next!
Stay down, and watch my stage!
Would you like to hold my hand the next time it happens?
You now embark on the nurturing of musical genius!
Every performer shall receive her share!
No! The next strike will only come harder!
You forsake me by not teaching me that technique!
The palace guards will keep these rabble away.

Not the time to reveal my hiding!
The crowd tranfixes on me!
A flawed arrangement to humiliate me!
I can't trust your sinister, leering eyes.
Pain begets improvement.
I will persevere throughout the trial.
Like a tone-deaf oaf instructing a master symphonist.

No, my spot is right here - center stage.
Not yet, can't you hear the crowd clamouring for another song?
All that deception to silence the performer.
I have my own.
Hold that! The climax of my performance is nigh!
I'd like something with a bit more colour.
Leave the performer to her fate...
Save it, that does little to help my song.
Oh but I wouldn't look nice wearing that...
Where'd you all hid the succulent snack?
I won't be touched with creeping intent!
And lure a performer with false hope once more?
Hands off me, rascal.
How sweet, but I can bear this at least.
You mistake my exhilaration for discomfort?
Life as a performer is to endure abuse.
I suffer to entertain.
Lets not prolong my sorrowful song...
There is no saving the defiled.
Is there no bread to go with that?
Go away, evil tickling person!
Ha ha, only if you catch me!
You wish to unsettle my rhythm?

You trespass my boundaries.

Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Death will not claim another friend from me.
The reverberations of my music speak to me...
Hear that? Another trapped hallway.
Hear me, my songs, and protect these friends of mine...
Music works in mysterious ways.
My weapon will need fine-tuning after this.
Ouch! Looks painful.
Nearly broke my weapon, but not complaining!
Music to my ears!
Stand down and watch my performance.
Oh! I can see a hole through you...
Didn't expect to be shot by a musical instrument?
I... no longer have the strength to lift my crossbow...
I can barely stand...
Lay down, and listen to my song.
*Plays music*
I know 268 different ways to treat a wound. Let me help.
I have the bandages here. Lets see to that wound.
You are merely tired, not weak. Our enemies would rue the day they underestimated you.
How can you be weak when you're my shining shield and the reason I'm still alive?
My spirit yearns for music.
I can hear their music, bidding me to forsake my life.
I cannot go on, not with this weight I'm carrying!
Is... is something behind me? I don't want to bring up the rear!
One of you tampered with my instrument, admit it!
One of you has a vile scheme to keep me cowered!
What use is there for someone who couldn't understand my music?
Weaklings like you should just hide underneath my skirts.
Shooting, singing, and music; must I do everything myself?
My skirts are soaked in my own blood. How... exquisite.
Physical pain is nothing compared to emotional sorrow.
I must smear my skirts with blood!
I'd be a fool to perform for you tone-deaf bumpkins.
Enough! No more songs today!
All of you are my shields!
At least I'm destined to die in the bloom of youth.
Their music is more enthralling than mine...
Neither my bolts nor song could reach them...
My music is enough to answer their blade! Ahaha!!
See how the shadows shrink away from my song?
Shhh! I'm actually an incarnation of the Goddess of Music, but keep it secret!
My songs stand strong against such meagre adversaries!
I will not falter while my music still speaks!
Hear my music, and be cowered!
Don't give up! My crossbow's got your back!
Steel your legs with my music's support!
A triumphant ballad for the victory to come!
Let my songs support your strikes!
Hear my music, steel your mind!
I am here, as are my songs.
My crossbow and my music are... powerful.
I will sweep them with my crescendo!
I will blast them with music!
I'll show you something they don't expect!
My crossbow will not fall apart this day!
I'd usually be afraid, yet my arm remains steady.
My melody embraces me!
Hah! You think my song has ended?
My mind and my music intertwines!
Hear my voice, embrace my music.
A soothing song for stout hearts.
...and one, and two, and strike!
Let my music guide your aim.
The song of victory!
They cannot defeat our music!
My bow-arm will not falter!
My weapon feels lighter!
Protect me! I can't do this alone!
M-my fingers! They won't move!
I... I can't think of any tune to play!
I concede my revenge, let us leave!
You stepped on my skirts on purpose!
Don't touch me! None of you!
I saw you reaching for me, with disgraceful intent.
A performer, a songstress, and a painbearer!
Strike me deeper! I've been scraped harder that this!
Fear not the blood on my skirts, it will be half-drenched soon enough.
Why waste time playing music to tone-deaf mules?
Always in the way of my aim. Move aside!
Must I say 'please' to everything? PLEASE mind the tip of my crossbow.
No more music, enough for now.
10 coins per song, if you please.
I'm here just for my revenge, and the coin.
You want some music? Don't plead for it. Pay!
I should've died alongside my village when the Dragon attacked...
Is there no ballad to commemorate our imminent fall?
Here's a sorrowful tune for a hopeless struggle...
This encounter marks my musical end.
Come here timid bird, I shall sing and you shall listen.
I play for my lord, for my lover, and for my demise.
For the evening's performance, I shall play with my feet and dance on my hands!
Come here, carress these cords with your large hands...
Shield me!
Protect me!
I... I cannot!
S-stay away!
Foul tricks! My place is at the back!
I won't be tricked again!
Never put a musician in front!
Next up, a song of pain and blood.
Fling your blade at me as payment!
A true performer doesn't stop when her skirts are soaked in blood.
I am here! Your performer entreats your adulation!
Look at them, pleading for my music!
You there, is this the right tune? Tee hee.
Simply engaging my usual crowd with song.
My songs ends and I must withdraw.
Back and forth, like a ping pong!
My performance ends. Now I collect my coins...
Urgh, a drunken crowd as usual.
My last song, let me have the crowd at least.
The musician shall fall if it meant the blade will survive.
I'm ready to meet my kinsfolk, wherever they may be.
I've exhausted my music, to what end?
No song can play without willing hands.
What is a performer without her crowd? Let me withdraw.
I need space to pull my cords!
Move! I can take a better shot from here.
Those who cannot perform should shrink into the shadows.
'Tis a time for my performance. Step aside and be awed.
You are meant to be my shield!
I'll need to recover after that performance.
I'm a performer, not a warrior!
Not the time yet for the main performance.
I can't have my music encourage *them*!
I doubt my music will help this time.
Why shoot if they evade again?
This is no stage for a song.
Where are you looking at? My instrument? My clothes?
Another trick to avoid paying for my performance?
I know what you think of this performer.
This stage is not fit for my performance.
No song for you.
Must I now? I've not practiced.
Mystique no longer envelops my performance.
Your hands clap but your eyes jeer.
How unsightly my fingers are.
I cannot play without the radiance in my heart.
T'was a time when I'm a performer. Today I'm a sparrow.
Watch me spread my wings and fly in the sky...
I must arrange my hair before my performance.
Gah! Is that a wrinkle on my face?
Stay away, I'll perform how I see fit!
You nod but it wasn't encouragement.
I wouldn't play that song for a hundred coins!
I shall not fulfill your song request, scoundrel!
A song for my would-be slayer?
The best ballads were played during a bloodbath.
Let your music pierce my body!
Hah! Your amateurish opinion of music knows no end.
I don't play any of your boorish music.
I'll decide whether to shoot or to play.
I elect my own songs to play.
Leave me to my composition.
I will be the star of this performance!
This song is for me and me only!
All my songs were for naught...
My music cannot reach them. Why bother continuing?
This... wasm't the song I meant to play.
You cannot buy my instrument! I alone will play it!
Look here my fellow musicians. A crowd clamouring to be pleased!
If I sing, will *you* dance?
W-what is that chilling tune?
H-hold my hand! I cannot stop trembling.
That song before was like a death rattle.
You would all abandon a musician as she sleeps, admit it!
How could I sleep with your sinister eyes looking at me?
There is a phrase in my culture - 'stabbing one in the back as they sleep'.
No sleep for the performer. I shall sing and play throughout your rest.
This wound is a testament of my battle worthiness.
Are you alright? Surely those shallow cuts don't need stitching.
You uncultured lot couldn't appreciate good music.
How low! A performer simply doesn't sleep with her crowd.
My body will recover amidst song and rhythm, unlike you lot.
Keep watch while your performer rests.
Each song I charge a mere 10 coins.
Your performer needs her sleep. You lot hold the watch.
Not a single song I played was in tune...
Why do I keep pushing while my music falters?
A sorrowful tune, marking our predicament.
To clean this musical instrument, I require butter, some wine, and your socks.
As a sparrow, I'll sleep with my wings spread across our bedrolls.
Hee hee! No sleep for all 'til I've finished my piece!
Your music! Strike me with it!
Don't see me as a warrior? Look again!
My spirit fails... This, I can do...
A mere meat-shield without her music...
My music falters without anxiety!
A final flourish to my song.
Never touch me again!
I watched you trying to cut me that time!
Feel this? 'Tis how you strike!
You're in the way of my bolts!
Part of the upcoming ballad my dear, worry not.
Appraise this shot, I must know if it hurts.
Does this make me a worthier foe?
Surely you can't miss the blood-soaked skirt?
Another discarded musician falls aside.
The culmination of my performance...
The bolts must return to their wielder!
My strange mechanism moved on its own!
You'd all run ahead as I fall behind!
Everyone sacrifices their musician, always!
'Tis a fitting stage for my final performance.
Let us die here, on the main stage.
Not yet! My song must end in the blade and blood!
A battle ballad doesn't end until a side falls!
Leaving? But the culmination of my song is nigh!
Why? The musical gods want to see this battle through!
Take my instrument, just leave me!
Mercy! I'll sing no more!
You would strike a mere musician? Who sent you!
That meant to rob me of my voice!
This skirt costs more than our whole loot!
Put your lives to protect my instrument!
Once more, show us how much you crave me!
Prick my flesh! Cut my skirts!
A performer's worth is measured by her scars.
My gratitude for the lesson, master.
S-stop! My heart falters even so!
Make it stop or make them hit!
A royal decree to willfully miss the performer's face?
A false reprieve for the beatings to come!
You had my heart racing for nought!
My music yearns for approval!
Oh my... those coins weren't for me?
Bulk me down with another instrument if it helps.
That was to be my ballad's main villain!
I had that in my sights! You ruined the surprise!
You thought that was worthy of song?
You splattered ichor over my skirts!
Stop! They carry a fragile instrument!
Yes, beat me next. Let me in the fun.
You've doomed me to fail as you did!
N-no! Keep its attention from me!
A blatantly deceiving performance!
Sully us not with your drunken act.
No amount of time can help you muster the fundamentals of music.
An urchin flinging a flute wouldn't have missed that...
(sigh) Placing more burden on the performer.
Unrefined and untrained, why do we bother bringing you?
Ha-ha! They failed to catch the ball!
Oh, look how they dance, those steps!
Noo! I can foresee your fall!
Y-you'd die for me?
Just like competing musicians turning on each other...
You cry at your superficial wounds.
I will honour your scar with song!
What admirable pain! I'm prepared to go next!
Stay down, and watch my stage!
Would you like to hold my hand the next time it happens?
You now embark on the nurturing of musical genius!
Every performer shall receive her share!
No! The next strike will only come harder!
You forsake me by not teaching me that technique!
The palace guards will keep these rabble away.
What are you doing? That wasn't part of our performance.
Not the time to reveal my hiding!
The crowd tranfixes on me!
A flawed arrangement to humiliate me!
I can't trust your sinister, leering eyes.
Pain begets improvement.
I will persevere throughout the trial.
Like a tone-deaf oaf instructing a master symphonist.
How could I perform under your ceaseless interference?
No, my spot is right here - center stage.
Not yet, can't you hear the crowd clamouring for another song?
All that deception to silence the performer.
I have my own.
Hold that! The climax of my performance is nigh!
I'd like something with a bit more colour.
Leave the performer to her fate...
Save it, that does little to help my song.
Oh but I wouldn't look nice wearing that...
Where'd you all hid the succulent snack?
I won't be touched with creeping intent!
And lure a performer with false hope once more?
Hands off me, rascal.
How sweet, but I can bear this at least.
You mistake my exhilaration for discomfort?
Life as a performer is to endure abuse.
I suffer to entertain.
Lets not prolong my sorrowful song...
There is no saving the defiled.
Is there no bread to go with that?
Go away, evil tickling person!
Ha ha, only if you catch me!
You wish to unsettle my rhythm?
Do I dare to presume you find me lacking?
You trespass my boundaries.
Dulling the pain is akin to failing the lesson.
I have learnt more gruelling compositions without help.
I've not had a musical handicap I don't relish!
When the comforting becomes the comforted...
Pitying the downtrodden musician begets you no good.
No music of ours could lift my misery.
Today I turn my back towards music!
What's this, a marriage proposal? I graciously decline.
I hide nothing under my skirts. See?
No! My songs will attract *them*!
I'll play when I'm safely back in town!
Why risk our lives for a mere song?
Performers play while emperors scheme. How obvious.
Not about to play songs I'm not accustomed to.
Plotting for the performer to lower her guard?
Weary and tired, yet the performers refuse break.
Tonics and songs are unneeded if the body persists!
This girl isn't whining. You shouldn't too.
Why do I toil while you scoundrels lay idle?
Ugh... to sing for such unappreciative company.
Am I the only performer amongst this boorish lot?
Never force a performer to play if she doesn't want to.
Not taking any more song requests.
I've to rest my fingers, dear.
To fall from an emperor's stage to a dilapidated cranny...
Not even my songs are deserving to keep you company.
A discarded performer is unworthy of entertainment...
This is my instrument, his name is Ping. Little Ping is looking for his mother.
Perhalps later. For now we listen to this melodious wind.
One time I was like this, playing my instrument in the dark, and then.... GAAH! Tee hee!
Would a rabbit trust a monkey's offer? Thought not.
I'm not the hapless musician of your fancies.
Could you not sneak towards me with a devilish grin?
Harmonious rhythm is the product of enduring duress.
Pain is an enticement to refine my songs.
What is pain to some, is inducement to struggling performers.
Cease your slobbering over me!
Stop unsettling me with your fallacies!
You have not earned the right to touch me!
No tincture can cure the feeble heart.
My apathetic performance deserves no pity.
Tend to others. Leave the destitute performer to herself.
The hands prepared those food could be the ones stabbing our backs!
A little stomach growl is preferable to... whatever you put in there.
Hunger is no hindrance to a musical showpiece.
Let starvation be my musical stimulus!
My appetite is as flat my insipid melody.
A stumbling performer is a hungry performer.
Licking this slab is nourishment itself.
I'm a part of the Order Of Starving Musicians.
古琴

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.

Guqin

The Guqin's traditional dress stands in sharp contrast to the hybrid contraption propped over her shoulder. This exquisite mechanism is one part ancient musical instrument and one part crude crossbow. Although deadly, its weight and deterioration with repeated use requires constant maintenance to keep it intact.

The Guqin's delicate appearance belies the expert handling of her bulky weapon. Her deadly bolts and uplifting songs, if allowed time to prepare, can be unleashed in tandem to devastate her foes and support her companions.

Any campsite is a performing stage for the Guqin. She eagerly entertains with song and laughter, its lingering effects often emboldening companions to perform beyond the capabilities they are accustomed to.
